patthana21.55:4.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.55:5.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:6.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.55:7.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:8.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.55:9.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:10.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.55:11.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:12.1: Nasavitakkaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.55:13.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:14.1: Nasavicāraṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avicāro sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.55:15.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:16.1: Nasappītikaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasappītiko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.55:17.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:18.1: Napītisahagataṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca napītisahagato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.55:19.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:20.1: Nasukhasahagataṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.55:21.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:22.1: Naupekkhāsahagataṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.55:23.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:24.1: Nakāmāvacaraṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.55:25.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:26.1: Narūpāvacaraṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.55:27.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:28.1: Naarūpāvacaraṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naarūpāvacaro sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.55:29.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:30.1: Napariyāpannaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pariyāpanno sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.55:31.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:32.1: Naniyyānikaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.55:33.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:34.1: Naniyataṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.55:35.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:36.1: Nasauttaraṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sauttaro sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.55:37.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:38.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.55:39.1: Naaraṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.55:40.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naaraṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.55:41.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:42.2: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … aññamaññe ekaṃ … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:43.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.55:43.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana21.55:47.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.55:48.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana21.55:48.4: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … nakamme ekaṃ, naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge ekaṃ … pe … novigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:54.1: Nasaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo araṇassa sanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana21.55:54.2: Naaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo araṇassa sanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana21.55:55.1: Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve … pe … sahajāte nissaye tīṇi, pacchājāte kamme dve, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre indriye jhāne magge vippayutte dve … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:56.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
